title: Jennifer Lopez shows off taut abs during sweaty workout... after serving bridal looks for new movie
text:
At 50 years old, Jennifer Lopez looks better than ever, which she recently proved in her latest movie Hustlers.

The multi-hyphenate is already hard at work on the set of her next movie Marry Me, in which she stars alongside Owen Wilson.

She took to Instagram Sunday, showing off the fruits of her labor as she flashed her taut abs, following a sweaty workout.

Gym bunny: Jennifer Lopez took to Instagram Sunday, showing off the fruits of her labor as she flashed her taut abs, following a sweaty workout

The On the Floor artist sported a long-sleeve yellow crop top with thumb holes, paired with skintight grey workout pants, featuring multi-toned yellow stripes.

She has long been known to cut a stunning figure, most notably in her iconic plunging green Versace dress at the Grammy Awards in 2000.

Lopez recently rocked an updated version of the dress for Versace's runway show at Milan Fashion Week.

She also put her tight bod on display this year when she played Ramona in the stripper crime drama Hustlers.

Sweaty workout: She sported a long-sleeve yellow crop top with thumb holes, paired with skintight grey workout pants, featuring multi-toned yellow stripes

Serving body: Lopez has long been known to cut a stunning figure, most notably in her iconic plunging green Versace dress at the Grammy Awards in 2000

Déjà vu: She recently rocked an updated version of the dress for Versace's runway show at Milan Fashion Week

In her next film Marry Me, the Bronx native trades in the g-string for a wedding dress.

She stars as Kat Valdez, a popstar who finds out her fiancé (Maluma) has been cheating on her, moments before their wedding at Madison Square Garden.

After learning the truth, she dumps him and chooses a random stranger from the crowd to marry instead, a math teacher played by Wilson.

Leading lady: The 50-year-old also put her tight bod on display this year when she played Ramona in the stripper crime drama Hustlers

New movie: She's recently been spotted around New York City, filming her next movie Marry Me with Owen Wilson

White wedding: Most recently, she donned an opulent beaded wedding dress for the movie's big scene

She and her co-stars have frequently been spotted filming scenes around New York City.

Most recently, she donned an opulent beaded wedding dress for the movie's big scene.

It could be a peek of what's to come, as she's getting ready to tie the knot with Alex Rodriguez.

The couple celebrated their engagement party last month with their closest friends and family.
description: She has long been known to cut a stunning figure, most notably in her iconic plunging green Versace dress at the Grammy Awards in 2000, recently recreating the look at Milan Fashion Week.
